text: Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form for Post 4 - IARI Recruitment 2017 – RA & Semi skilled Labour Posts: ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has announced a notification for the recruitment of Research Associate (RA), Semi skilled Labour vacancies for the project titled “Chemical, structural and functional characterization of identified anti-tick lead phyto-chemicals and optimization of delivery matrix for effective application of natural formulation for the control of acaricide resistant ticks” on temporary basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 04-04-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 02 Name of the Post: 1. Research Associate (RA): 01 Post 2. Semi skilled Labour: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 40 years for Post 1, 30 years for Post 2 as on date of interview. Age relaxation is applicable for Women/ SC/ ST/ OBC/ PH candidates as per Govt. of India / ICAR rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Ph.D in Chemistry/ Agricultural Chemicals, Master’s degree in Chemistry (with specialization in Organic Chemistry) or Agricultural Chemicals with 4 years / 5 years of Bachelor’s Degree having 1st division or 60% marks or equivalent overall grade point average, with at least two years of research experience as evidenced from Fellowship/ Associate ship/ Training/ Other engagements with UGC/ CSIR/ ICAR/ NET qualification for Post 1, 12th pass for Post 2. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications in prescribed format along with original and self attested copies of all certificates, degrees, publications/ articles, experience certificate and no objection certificates by post to Assistant Administrative Officer, Division of Agricultural Chemicals, ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute, New Delhi – 110 012 or by email to at head_chem@iari.res.in and rkb1973@gmail.com on or before 04-04-2017. Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Applications: 04-04-2017. Date of Interview: 12-04-2017. Venue: Room No. 139 (Conference room), Division of Agricultural Chemicals, ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute, New Delhi – 110 012. For more details like consolidated pay & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - IARI Recruitment 2017 – Walk in for SRF Posts: ICAR – Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi has invited applications for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow vacancies for different projects on temporary, contractual basis. Eligible candidates can walk in interview on 24, 27-03-2017 at 10.00 a.m. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… IARI Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Senior Research Fellow: 01 Post 2. Senior Research Fellow: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 35 years for Post 1. Age relaxation of 5 years for SC/ ST & women and 3 years for OBC candidates for Post 1. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Master’s Degree in the Agricultural Statistics/ Statistics/ Computer Science/ Computer Application or equivalent along with 4 years/ 5 years of Bachelor’s degree or Master’s Degree with 3 years of Bachelor’s degree should have NET qualification or equivalent certificate for Post 1, Post Graduate degree in Botany/ Life Sciences/ Biotechnology or allied discipline with NET qualification & two years of relevant experience for Post 2. Selection Process: Selection will be based on interview. How to Apply: For Post 1: Eligible candidates can appear for interview along with original documents of age proof, educational qualifications and documents in support of additional qualification/ experience, a set of self attested Xerox copies along with the required Bio-data in the format given below, affix passport sized photograph on 24-03-2017 at 10:00 AM at Agricultural Knowledge Management Unit (AKMU), LBS Building, ICAR-IARI, Pusa, New Delhi. For Post 2: Eligible candidates may appear for interview along with original testimonials in support of their qualification/ experience on 27-03-2017 at 10.00 a.m at Room No. 201, Division of Plant Physiology, ICAR-Indian Agricultural Research Institute, Pusa Campus, New Delhi – 110 012. Important Dates: Date & Time of Interview for Post 1: 24-03-2017 at 10:00 AM Date & Time of Interview for Post 1: 27-03-2017 at 10:00 AM Reporting Time: 09.30 A.M.
